Reading List

This (incomplete, almost ordered) list contains the stuff I am reading these days as a part of various activities (IU Computer Vision Lab reading group, computer vision course, masters thesis, internship, various projects, and self-interest).

Ciregan, Dan, Ueli Meier, and Jürgen Schmidhuber. Multi-Column Deep Neural Networks for Image Classification. IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2012. [pdf]
Ma, Minghuang, Haoqi Fan, and Kris M. Kitani. Going Deeper into First-Person Activity Recognition. arXiv preprint arXiv:1605.03688 (2016). [pdf]
4/26/2016 Yu, Rui, et al. Direct, Dense, and Deformable: Template-Based non-Rigid 3D Reconstruction from RGB Video. IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) 2015. [pdf]
4/26/2016 Bailer, Christian, Bertram Taetz, and Didier Stricker. Flow Fields: Dense Correspondence Fields for Highly Accurate Large Displacement Optical Flow Estimation. IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) 2015. [pdf]
4/19/2016 Redmon, Joseph, et al. You Only Look Once: Unified, Real-Time Object Detection. arXiv preprint arXiv:1506.02640 (2015). [pdf]
4/19/2016 Song, Yale, et al. TVSum: Summarizing Web Videos using Titles. IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2015. [pdf]
John, Vijay, et al. Pedestrian Detection in Thermal Images using Adaptive Fuzzy C-Means Clustering and Convolutional Neural Networks. IAPR Conference on Machine Vision Applications (IAPR MVA) 2015. [pdf]
Zhang, Li, Bo Wu, and Ram Nevatia. Pedestrian Detection in Infrared Images Based on Local Shape Features. IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2007. [pdf]
Nanda, Harsh, and Larry Davis. Probabilistic Template Based Pedestrian Detection in Infrared Videos. IEEE Intelligent Vehicle Symposium 2002. [pdf]
Bertozzi, Massimo, et al. Pedestrian Detection for Driver Assistance using Multiresolution Infrared Vision. IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology 2004. [pdf]
4/12/2016 Krause, Jonathan, et al. The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Noisy Data for Fine-Grained Recognition. arXiv preprint arXiv:1511.06789 (2015). [pdf]
4/12/2016 Weyand, Tobias, Ilya Kostrikov, and James Philbin. Planet-Photo Geolocation with Convolutional Neural Networks. arXiv preprint arXiv:1602.05314 (2016). [pdf]
4/5/2016 Zhang, Richard, Phillip Isola, and Alexei A. Efros. Colorful Image Colorization. arXiv preprint arXiv:1603.08511 (2016). [pdf]
4/5/2016 Huang, Gao, et al. Deep Networks with Stochastic Depth. arXiv preprint arXiv:1603.09382 (2016). [pdf]
3/29/2016 Yonetani, Ryo, Kris M. Kitani, and Yoichi Sato. Ego-surfing First Person Videos. IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2015. [pdf]
3/29/2016 Poleg, Yair, et al. Egosampling: Fast-Forward and Stereo for Egocentric Videos. IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2015. [pdf]
3/22/2016 Dubey, Rachit, et al. What Makes an Object Memorable? IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) 2015. [pdf]
3/22/2016 Meyers, Austin, et al. Im2Calories: Towards an Automated Mobile Vision Food Diary. IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) 2015. [pdf]
3/8/2016 Park, Hyun Soo, Yedong Niu, and Jianbo Shi. Future Localization from an Egocentric Depth Image. arXiv preprint arXiv:1509.02094 (2015). [pdf]
